description: Nikko Alexander puts his hot ass on the line by agreeing to take on two NK veterans when his partner bails out at the last minute. Jake Austin and Cameron Adams both have kicked their share of asses on the NK mat and are up for the challenge of taking down Nikko. Will Nikko's professional cage fighting and NK experience be enough to beat down his opponents and earn him the right to fuck both of the losers tight holes or will Jake and Cameron be strong enough to destroy Nikko and then take turns fucking his beautiful bubble butt. It's two on one in this week's NK match and that guarantees an explosive match and a fuck finale that will raise definitely the bar and leave everyone covered in cum.
title: Nikko Alexander vs Jake Austin and Cameron Adams The Oil Match
